title: Real-life 'Transformer' unveiled in Japan
text:
Real-life 'Transformer' unveiled in Japan 10:39am BST - 00:51
Japanese engineers show off a 12-foot robot that can transform into a sports car and actually carry people onboard, in what they said was a first-ever in the history of robots. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
